version_description:
* Visual improvements
* Fixed all the known crashes
* Fixed many many bugs!

* TV and Movie Requests are now available.
* Added tabbed view to the search and requests, this should improve the usability.
* Changed the color scheme to match Ombi's color.
* Fixed the Movies and TV Shows refreshing when changing tabs.
* Fixed the bug where it wouldn't show the approve buttons.
* Updated all the backend packages.
* Small minor technical improvements and bug fixes.

Please note you require Ombi version 3.0.3416 or later.

* TV and Movie Requests are now available.
* Added tabbed view to the search and requests, this should improve the usability.
* Changed the color scheme to match Ombi's color scheme.
* Fixed the Movies and TV Shows refreshing when changing tabs.
* Fixed the bug where it wouldn't show the approve buttons.
* Updated all the backend packages.
* Fixed the issue where you could not restore purchases.
* Small minor improvements.


This is the Release Candidate.

Please note you require Ombi version 3.0.3416 or later.

Fixed requests not appearing sometimes
Fixed menu text
Added Pull to refresh for requests
Fixed a bug on the settings page where it wouldn't update your notification preference
Fixed a typo in the menu
Added manual login to the app on it's inital launch

* Fixed the iPhone X Issue with not being able to use the manual login
* Added View on Emby and View on Plex buttons

Plenty of technical improvements and bug fixes
Redesigned settings page

Enjoy! More regular updates incoming
